d: A multi-armed companion for next-level hugs

s.octopusEye.t: The octopus eye is not shown
s.octopusEye.d: The **Octopus eye** is a circular piece of fabric with a diameter of {{{ width }}}.
s.octopusPupil.t: The octopus pupil is not shown
s.octopusPupil.d: The **Octopus pupil** is a circular piece of fabric with a diameter of {{{ width }}}.
s.octopusEyebrow.t: The octopus eyebrow is not shown
s.octopusEyebrow.d: The **Octopus eyebrow** is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.
s.squidEye.t: The squid eye is not shown
s.squidEye.d: The **Squid eye** is a circular piece of fabric with a diameter of {{{ width }}}.
s.squidPupil.t: The squid pupil is not shown
s.squidPupil.d: The **Squid pupil** is a circular piece of fabric with a diameter of {{{ width }}}.
s.squidEyebrow.t: The squid eyebrow is not shown
s.squidEyebrow.d: The **Squid eyebrow** is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.

size.d: Controls the overall size (value shown is the size of the head)

type.d: Allows you to choose one of the variants of this design

armWidth.d: Controls the width of the arms

armLength.d: Controls the length of the arms

neckWidth.d: Determines the width at the neck

armTaper.d: Controls the amount by which the arms taper

bottomTopArmRatio.d: Changes the ratio between the fabric on the top of the arms versus that on the bottom of the arms

bottomArmReduction.d: This changes how long the bottom fabric of the arms is compared to the top fabric. It makes the arms more curly

bottomArmReductionPlushy.d: This changes how long the bottom fabric of the arms is compared to the top fabric. It makes the arms more curly
